articles.title: More than 200 killed in mine collapse in eastern DR Congo : Report
articles.summary: News | Mining More than 200 killed in mine collapse in eastern DR Congo: Report Rights groups raised concerns over conditions at the mine, which supplies about 15 percent of the worldâ€™s coltan used in advanced electronics. Labourers dig at the Rubaya coltan mine in the town of Rubaya, which is controlled by M23 rebels, in the eastern Democratic Republic of the Congo, in March 2025 [File: Zohra Bensemra/Reuters] By AFP and Reuters Published On 31

articles.title: Ark Invest Says AI Spending Could Triple : Here the Stock to Buy for 2026
articles.summary: In her Big Ideas 2026 report, fund manager Cathie Wood of Ark Invest ( ARKK 3.57% ) predicted that annual data center capital expenditures (capex) would go from around $500 billion in 2025 to $1.4 trillion in 2030. If that happens, one of the best stocks to invest in will be Broadcom ( AVGO +0.15% ) . articles.title: These 2 Cryptocurrencies Could Skyrocket in 2026
articles.summary: At a time when gold is outperforming every major cryptocurrency on the planet, it's easier than you might think to find a cryptocurrency capable of skyrocketing in value this year. I've found two beaten-down cryptos -- XRP ( XRP 1.42% ) and Sui ( SUI 4.18% ) -- capable of doing just that.
